Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.1 Kusalapada » 2.3.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
28.
1312Hetusampayutto kusalo dhammo hetusampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1313Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ…pe…  kamme ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
